message.body: Hey, are you teaching today? My classes are all going to be really short syllabus reviews so maybe there will be time to have lunch/tea after work/etc?
Hey! I'm subbing at temple 4-9:30 tonight. What's your schedule tomorrow??
Tomorrow is great for me. I'm not busy at all.
Great!! Maybe early afternoon coffee date! I'll be around all day.
Hi! I have a ticket to see the pixies at noon. Would it be better for you to meet before that or after around 3?
